languages.text: {n}Одурманенный разлитым в воздухе страданием, Маражай не колеблется ни секунды — он резко тянет вас к себе и впивается в ваши губы. Боль от сжавшихся на шее металлических когтей мешается с соленым вкусом крови из прокушенной губы, и вы тонете, тонете, тонете в темном, вязком, бесконечном омуте...{/n}

{n}Drunk on the misery-soaked air, Marazhai does not hesitate for a second — he drags you to him and covers your mouth with his own. The pain of his metal claws digging into your neck mingles with the salty taste of blood from your bitten lips, and you sink, sink, sink into a dark, viscous, endless abyss...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Одурманенный разлитым в воздухе страданием, Маражай не колеблется ни секунды — он резко тянет вас к себе и впивается в ваши губы. Боль от сжавшихся на шее металлических когтей мешается с соленым вкусом крови из прокушенной губы, и вы тонете, тонете, тонете в темном, вязком, бесконечном омуте...{/n}

The pain of his metal claws digging into your neck mingles with the salty taste of blood from your bitten lips, and you sink, sink, sink into a dark, viscous, endless abyss...{/n}

languages.text: {n}迷醉在恐怖气息中的玛拉斋没有丝毫犹豫，将你拖到他身边，将他的嘴覆在了你的嘴上。他的金属利爪嵌入你脖子时的痛楚，以及你的嘴唇被咬破时咸咸的血腥味交织在一起。你沉入了黑暗、粘稠、无尽的深渊之中，不断下落，不断下落……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drunk on the misery-soaked air, Marazhai does not hesitate for a second — he drags you to him and covers your mouth with his own. The pain of his metal claws digging into your neck mingles with the salty taste of blood from your bitten lips, and you sink, sink, sink into a dark, viscous, endless abyss...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}迷醉在恐怖气息中的玛拉斋没有丝毫犹豫，将你拖到他身边，吻在了你的嘴上。他的金属利爪嵌入你脖子时的痛楚，以及你的嘴唇被咬破时咸咸的血腥味交织在一起。你沉入了黑暗、粘稠、无尽的深渊之中，不断下落，不断下落……{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは惨劇の空気に酔いしれており、全く躊躇することなく、あなたを抱き寄せて自分の口であなたの口を塞いだ。首に食い込む金属の爪の痛みと、噛まれた唇から出る血の塩味が混ざり合い、あなたは暗くベッタリした果てしない深淵にずぶずぶ、ずぶずぶと沈んでいく…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drunk on the misery-soaked air, Marazhai does not hesitate for a second — he drags you to him and covers your mouth with his own. The pain of his metal claws digging into your neck mingles with the salty taste of blood from your bitten lips, and you sink, sink, sink into a dark, viscous, endless abyss...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは惨劇の空気に酔いしれており、全く躊躇することなく、あなたを抱き寄せて自分の口であなたの口を塞いだ。首に食い込む金属の爪の痛みと、噛まれた唇から出る血の塩味が混ざり合い、あなたは暗くベッタリした果てしない深淵にずぶずぶ、ずぶずぶと沈んでいく…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Embriagado por la miseria que impregna el aire, Marazhai no duda ni un segundo. Te arrastra hacia él y cubre su boca con la tuya. El dolor de sus garras de metal al clavarse en tu cuello se mezcla con el salobre sabor de la sangre que mana de tus labios mordidos y te sumes gradualmente en un abismo oscuro, viscoso e infinito...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drunk on the misery-soaked air, Marazhai does not hesitate for a second — he drags you to him and covers your mouth with his own. The pain of his metal claws digging into your neck mingles with the salty taste of blood from your bitten lips, and you sink, sink, sink into a dark, viscous, endless abyss...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Embriagado por la miseria que impregna el aire, Marazhai no duda ni un segundo. Te arrastra hacia él y cubre su boca con la tuya. El dolor de sus garras de metal al clavarse en tu cuello se mezcla con el salobre sabor de la sangre que mana de tus labios mordidos y te sumes gradualmente en un abismo oscuro, viscoso e infinito...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Grisé par la détresse ambiante, Marazhai n'hésite pas une seule seconde. Il vous attire à lui et pose sa bouche sur la vôtre. La douleur que vous ressentez lorsque ses griffes de métal s'enfoncent dans votre nuque se mêle au goût salé du sang qui suinte de vos lèvres meurtries, et vous plongez toujours plus profondément dans un abîme insondable de ténèbres visqueuses...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drunk on the misery-soaked air, Marazhai does not hesitate for a second — he drags you to him and covers your mouth with his own. The pain of his metal claws digging into your neck mingles with the salty taste of blood from your bitten lips, and you sink, sink, sink into a dark, viscous, endless abyss...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Grisé par la détresse ambiante, Marazhai n'hésite pas une seule seconde. Il vous attire à lui et pose sa bouche sur la vôtre. La douleur que vous ressentez lorsque ses griffes de métal s'enfoncent dans votre nuque se mêle au goût salé du sang qui suinte de vos lèvres meurtries, et vous plongez toujours plus profondément dans un abîme insondable de ténèbres visqueuses...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wie betrunken von der elenden Atmosphäre zögert Marazhai keinen weiteren Moment – er zieht dich zu sich und drückt seinen Mund auf deinen. Der Schmerz seiner Metallklauen, die sich in deinen Nacken graben, vermischt sich mit dem salzigen Geschmack des Bluts, das aus deinen aufgebissenen Lippen strömt, und du versinkst tief in einem dunklen, schleimigen und endlosen Abgrund ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drunk on the misery-soaked air, Marazhai does not hesitate for a second — he drags you to him and covers your mouth with his own. The pain of his metal claws digging into your neck mingles with the salty taste of blood from your bitten lips, and you sink, sink, sink into a dark, viscous, endless abyss...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wie betrunken von der elenden Atmosphäre zögert Marazhai keinen weiteren Moment – er zieht dich zu sich und drückt seinen Mund auf deinen. Der Schmerz seiner Metallklauen, die sich in deinen Nacken graben, vermischt sich mit dem salzigen Geschmack des Bluts, das aus deinen aufgebissenen Lippen strömt, und du versinkst tief in einem dunklen, schleimigen und endlosen Abgrund ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Izdıraba bulanmış havadan sarhoşa dönen Marazhai, bir saniye bile tereddüt etmiyor. Seni kendine çekerek dudaklarını dudaklarıyla örtüyor. Boynunu delen metal pençelerinin yaşattığı acı, ısırılan dudaklarından damlayan kanın tuzlu aromasıyla karışıyor ve karanlık, yoğun, ebedî bir uçurumun gittikçe daha da... Daha da derinlerine dalıyorsun...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drunk on the misery-soaked air, Marazhai does not hesitate for a second — he drags you to him and covers your mouth with his own. The pain of his metal claws digging into your neck mingles with the salty taste of blood from your bitten lips, and you sink, sink, sink into a dark, viscous, endless abyss...{/n}
